lattice.comment: Type of lattice to create the initial particles (default=1)

rhopgradient.comment: Initial density gradient 1:Rhop0, 2:Water column, 3:Max. water height (default=2)

hswl.comment: Maximum height of still water to calculate speedofsound using coefsound

gamma.comment: Polytropic constant for water used in the state equation

speedsystem.comment: Maximum system speed (by default the dam-break propagation is used)

speedsound.comment: Speed of sound to use in the simulation (by default speedofsound=coefsound*speedsystem)

coefh.comment: Coefficient to calculate the smoothing length (h=coefh*sqrt(3*dp^2) in 3D)

_hdp.comment: Alternative option to calculate the smoothing length (h=hdp*dp)

<abort if="Dp<0.1" text="Dp ([Dp]) is lower than 0.1 \n It is invalid." />

direction.comment: Direction to apply velocity magnitude or used to calculate starting from 3-component velocity data.

meshdata.comment: Velocity data (magnitude or 3 components) mesh-data file (CSV or binary).

direction.comment: Direction to apply velocity magnitude or used to calculate starting from 3-component velocity data.

meshdata.comment: Velocity data (magnitude or 3 components) mesh-data file (CSV or binary).

densitydepth.comment: Position of surface water level is computed automatically

meshdata.comment: Density data from mesh-data file (CSV or binary).

translationDOF.comment: Use 0 to restrict Degrees Of Freedon for translation (default=(1,1,1))

rotationDOF.comment: Use 0 to restrict Degrees Of Freedon for rotation (default=(1,1,1))

casedef.normals: <svnormals value="1" comment="Saves VTK with particle normals according to for debug (default=0)" />

parameter.comment: Saves particle position using double precision (default=0)
**DEPRECATED** Precision in particle interaction 0:Simple, 1:Double, 2:Uses and saves double (default=0)
Boundary method 1:DBC, 2:mDBC (default=1)
Step Algorithm 1:Verlet, 2:Symplectic (default=1)
Verlet only: Number of steps to apply Euler timestepping (default=40)
Interaction Kernel 1:Cubic Spline, 2:Wendland, 3:Gaussian (default=2)
Viscosity formulation 1:Artificial, 2:Laminar+SPS (default=1)
Viscosity value
Multiply viscosity value with boundary (default=1)
Density Diffusion Term 0:None, 1:Molteni, 2:Fourtakas, 3:Fourtakas(full) (default=0)
DDT value (default=0.1)
Shifting mode 0:None, 1:Ignore bound, 2:Ignore fixed, 3:Full (default=0)
Coefficient for shifting computation (default=-2)
Threshold to detect free surface. Typically 1.5 for 2D and 2.75 for 3D (default=0)
Rigid Algorithm 0:collision-free, 1:SPH, 2:DEM, 3:Chrono (default=1)
Time to freeze the floatings at simulation start (warmup) (default=0)
Ignores floating body radius with periodic conditions (default=0)
Coefficient to calculate minimum time step dtmin=coefdtmin*h/speedsound (default=0.05)
Initial time step. Use 0 to defult use (default=h/speedsound)
Minimum time step. Use 0 to defult use (default=coefdtmin*h/speedsound)
Fixed Dt value. Use 0 to disable (default=disabled)
Dt values are loaded from file. Use NONE to disable (default=disabled)
Velocity of particles used to calculate DT. 1:All, 0:Only fluid/floating (default=0)
Time of simulation
Time out data
Minimum rhop valid (default=700)
Maximum rhop valid (default=1300)
%%/100 of fluid particles allowed to be excluded from domain (default=1)
Active warning according to number of out particles (default=1)
**DEPRECATED** Increase of Z+ (default=0)
**DEPRECATED** The domain is fixed with the specified values (xmin:ymin:zmin:xmax:ymax:zmax)
**DEPRECATED** The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
**DEPRECATED** The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
**DEPRECATED** The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
**DEPRECATED** The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
**DEPRECATED** The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
**DEPRECATED** The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
Increase of Z with periodic BC in axis X
Increase of Y with periodic BC in axis X
Increase of X with periodic BC in axis Y
Increase of Z with periodic BC in axis Y
Increase of X with periodic BC in axis Z
Increase of Y with periodic BC in axis Z
Periodic BC in axes X and Y
Periodic BC in axes X and Z
Periodic BC in axes Y and Z
Activates symmetry in plane y=0 (default=0)

simulationdomain.comment: Defines domain of simulation (default=Uses minimun and maximum position of the generated particles)
